name: Don't Fail This Quiz, Zanna! | Musicals | 10 Questions

questions.text: Where does much of the action take place?
questions.explanation:
Heartsville High School.

	The main characters are students at Heartsville High School, although the time period is not specified. Heartsville is obviously not a real place.

questions.text: Who originated the role of Zanna Off-Broadway?
questions.explanation:
Jai Rodriguez.

	Jai also played Angel Schunard in the rock opera "Rent". He is best known for his culture expertise on "Queer Eye for the Straight Guy". He has also played Carmen Ghia in "The Producers".

questions.text: Which couple sings "I Think We Got Love"?
questions.explanation:
Mike and Steve.

	In Zanna's world, it is the football players who are the geeks and the chess players who act as the macho jocks. Steve is the lonely quarterback who benefits from dating a chess whiz, Mike.

questions.text: Kate Aspero begins to date Roberta. What had she thought was more important?
questions.explanation:
Academics.

	Kate had cited her Grade Point Average and SAT scores as far more important than a romantic relationship, but she finally began to date Roberta, a waitress. Kate has her eye on a medical degree.

questions.text: In Zanna's world, heterosexuality is frowned upon. What two characters realize they are attracted to each other?
questions.explanation:
Steve and Kate.

	Steve and Kate realize their mutual attraction in the reprise song of "Don't Ask, Don't Tell". Kate and Steve try to deny their attraction, but ultimately fail.

The chess tournament.

	Mike wins the chess tournament and all his friends go wild! In the celebration, Kate and Steve kiss. This hurts not only Roberta and Mike, but Kate and Steve as well.

questions.text: The students decide to write a musical about heterosexual couples in the workforce.
questions.explanation:
False.

	The students really write a musical about heterosexuals in the military. The show's songs include "Be a Man" and the original "Don't Ask, Don't Tell", which Kate and Steve reprise later.

questions.text: Zanna performs a spell with his magic wand to make his friends happy again. What does he inadvertently do?
questions.explanation:
Makes everyone heterosexual.

	After Zanna's spell, everyone is heterosexual and Steve abd Kate are the King and Queen of the Prom. It seems that Zanna himself is the only person who retains his original sexual orientation.

questions.text: Who sings the song "I Could Write Books"?
questions.explanation:
Mike.

	Mike sings "I Could Write Books" as he reflects on Steve's erratic behavior. Mike was played by Enrico Rodriguez, who has also appeared in "Fame" Off-Broadway and in "Rent" on Broadway. My favorite lyric in "Zanna, Don't!" is from this song: "I could write books'bout all the things you didn't do,And then write twice as much about how much I still love you."

questions.text: On his way home from prom, Zanna drops his shoe. Who returns it to him?
questions.explanation:
Tank.

	Tank was played by Robb Sapp. Sapp has also appeared in "Johnny Guitar" Off-Broadway as Turkey and in the ensemble of the Broadway musical "Wicked".
